OpenAIAPI(APIAuthentication)

Creates a new entry point to the OpenAPI API, handling auth and allowing access to the various API endpoints

Declaration
public OpenAIAPI(APIAuthentication apiKeys = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
APIAuthentication apiKeys

The API authentication information to use for API calls, or null to attempt to use the Default, potentially loading from environment vars or from a config file.

| Improve this Doc View Source

ApiUrlFormat

Base url for OpenAI for OpenAI, should be "https://api.openai.com/{0}/{1}" for Azure, should be "https://(your-resource-name.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/(deployment-id)/{1}?api-version={0}"

Chat

Text generation in the form of chat messages. This interacts with the ChatGPT API.

Declaration

| Improve this Doc View Source

Completions

Text generation is the core function of the API. You give the API a prompt, and it generates a completion. The way you “program” the API to do a task is by simply describing the task in plain english or providing a few written examples. This simple approach works for a wide range of use cases, including summarization, translation, grammar correction, question answering, chatbots, composing emails, and much more (see the prompt library for inspiration).

Declaration
public ICompletionEndpoint Completions { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
ICompletionEndpoint
| Improve this Doc View Source

Embeddings

The API lets you transform text into a vector (list) of floating point numbers. The distance between two vectors measures their relatedness. Small distances suggest high relatedness and large distances suggest low relatedness.

Declaration
public IEmbeddingEndpoint Embeddings { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
IEmbeddingEndpoint
| Improve this Doc View Source

Files

The API lets you do operations with files. You can upload, delete or retrieve files. Files can be used for fine-tuning, search, etc.

Declaration
public IFilesEndpoint Files { get; }

ImageGenerations

The API lets you do operations with images. Given a prompt and/or an input image, the model will generate a new image.

TextToSpeech

The Endpoint for the Text to Speech API. This allows you to generate audio from text. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-to-speech

Transcriptions

The endpoint for the audio transcription API. This allows you to generate text from audio. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/speech-to-text

Declaration

Property Value
Type Description
ITranscriptionEndpoint
| Improve this Doc View Source

Translations

The endpoint for the audio translation API. This allows you to generate English text from audio in other languages. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/speech-to-text/translations

Declaration
public ITranscriptionEndpoint Translations { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
ITranscriptionEndpoint

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

ForAzure(String, String, APIAuthentication)

Instantiates a version of the API for connecting to the Azure OpenAI endpoint instead of the main OpenAI endpoint.

Declaration
public static OpenAIAPI ForAzure(string YourResourceName, string deploymentId, APIAuthentication apiKey = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String YourResourceName

The name of your Azure OpenAI Resource
System.String deploymentId

The name of your model deployment. You're required to first deploy a model before you can make calls.
APIAuthentication apiKey

The API authentication information to use for API calls, or null to attempt to use the Default, potentially loading from environment vars or from a config file. Currently this library only supports the api-key flow, not the AD-Flow.
Returns
Type Description
OpenAIAPI

Implements

IOpenAIAPI
